text:
Thank you @vicderbyshire for highlighting the shocking #COVID19 death rate for people with a #LearningDisability. 

Despite the evidence, many are not a priority to get the #coronavirus #vaccine. 

Help us fight to change this.

Email your MP: https://t.co/y3kFBs9WLw 👈 https://t.co/gngsVmjbJ4
